reviewText: Book and DVD appears to be well thought out, time spent covering the basics was what I was looking for. Another buyer recommended this and they were spot on. Great Learning Tool for the beginning bass player.

I was disappointed when I received the dvd without the booklet.  On the cover of the dvd, it clearly states includes booklet.
The dvd is good but useless without the book to accompany it.
Great way to start simple strait forward and you've learned! For the price totally worth it! You'll know enough to jam with a band , write yoour lines and rock out!

1) It's easy to follow
2) The music is not boring (no 'Mary had a little lamb' examples)
3) DVD makes it easy to pause and replay to help learn hand position

I started learning bass guitar just by playing with it but Chris Kringle helps show you how to hold the guitar and where to place your fingers.  Get ready to build up your pinky finger strength!

This product will give you what you need to know to get started on playing bass right away.  It covers scales and reading, goes over styles and general tips, and provides songs and riffs to practice on.  Great if you are looking to teach yourself.
